title: The Mason Platform language schema (See: https://docs.bymason.com)

os.title: Custom OS schema
os.description: This is the project configuration for the custom OS you are designing

name.title: The Name Schema
name.description: The name of project in the Mason Platform

version.title: The Version Schema
version.description: The version of the project in the Mason Platform

configurations.title: The Configurations Schema
configurations.description: This is the list of all configurations used to customize the behavior of the operating system

config_actionMenuItemAllCaps.title: The config_actionMenuItemAllCaps Schema
config_actionMenuItemAllCaps.description: Whether action menu items should be displayed in ALLCAPS or not.&#10;Defaults to true. If this is not appropriate for specific locales&#10;it should be disabled in that locale's resources.

config_activityRecognitionHardwarePackag.title: The config_activityRecognitionHardwarePackageName Schema
config_activityRecognitionHardwarePackag.description: Package name providing Hardware Activity-Recognition API support. Used only when&#10;config_enableActivityRecognitionHardwareOverlay is false.

config_activityShortDur.title: The config_activityShortDur Schema
config_activityShortDur.description: The duration (in milliseconds) of the activity open/close and fragment open/close animations.

config_allowAllRotations.title: The config_allowAllRotations Schema
config_allowAllRotations.description: If true, the screen can be rotated via the accelerometer in all 4&#10;rotations as the default behavior.

config_allowAnimationsInLowPowerMode.title: The config_allowAnimationsInLowPowerMode Schema
config_allowAnimationsInLowPowerMode.description: This config is ued to determine whether animations are allowed in low power mode.

config_allowAutoBrightnessActiveDozeLigh.title: The config_allowAutoBrightnessActiveDozeLightSensor Schema
config_allowAutoBrightnessActiveDozeLigh.description: This flag enables light sensor sampling while dozing. A single sample is taken upon&#10;entering doze mode, and another sample is taken every time the display enters STATE_DOZE&#10;or STATE_DOZE_SUSPEND. It is recommended that config_dozeSensorLuxLevels and&#10;config_dozeBrightnessBacklightValues have entries so that the doze mode brightness can be&#10;determined dynamically.&#10;

config_allowAutoBrightnessWhileDozing.title: The config_allowAutoBrightnessWhileDozing Schema
config_allowAutoBrightnessWhileDozing.description: Allow automatic adjusting of the screen brightness while dozing in low power state.

config_allowDisablingAssistDisclosure.title: The config_allowDisablingAssistDisclosure Schema
config_allowDisablingAssistDisclosure.description: Flag indicating whether the assist disclosure can be disabled using&#10;ASSIST_DISCLOSURE_ENABLED.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromCameraLen.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromCameraLens Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromCameraLen.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from camera lens cover is switched.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromDock.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromDock Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromDock.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode when docked.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromGesture.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromGesture Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromGesture.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from gesture.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromKey.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromKey Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromKey.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from regular key press. Setting this value to&#10;true implies config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromPowerKey is also true

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromLidSwitch.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromLidSwitch Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromLidSwitch.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from lid switch.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromMotion.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromMotion Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromMotion.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from motion.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromMotionWhe.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromMotionWhenNotDreaming Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromMotionWhe.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from motion.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromPowerKey.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromPowerKey Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromPowerKey.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from power key press.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromUnplug.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromUnplug Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromUnplug.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode when plugged in or unplugged.

config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromWindowLay.title: The config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromWindowLayout Schema
config_allowTheaterModeWakeFromWindowLay.description: If this is true, allow wake from theater mode from window layout flag.

config_alwaysUseCdmaRssi.title: The config_alwaysUseCdmaRssi Schema
config_alwaysUseCdmaRssi.description: Set to true if the RSSI should always display CDMA signal strength even on EVDO

config_animateScreenLights.title: The config_animateScreenLights Schema
config_animateScreenLights.description: If this is true, the screen will fade off.

config_annoy_dianne.title: The config_annoy_dianne Schema
config_annoy_dianne.description: Don't name config resources like this.  It should look like config_annoyDianne

config_appsAuthorizedForSharedAccounts.title: The config_appsAuthorizedForSharedAccounts Schema
config_appsAuthorizedForSharedAccounts.description: Apps that are authorized to access shared accounts, overridden by product overlays

config_appsNotReportingCrashes.title: The config_appsNotReportingCrashes Schema
config_appsNotReportingCrashes.description: List of comma separated package names for which we the system will not show crash, ANR,&#10;etc. dialogs.

config_autoBrightnessAdjustmentMaxGamma.title: The config_autoBrightnessAdjustmentMaxGamma Schema
config_autoBrightnessAdjustmentMaxGamma.description: The maximum range of gamma adjustment possible using the screen&#10;auto-brightness adjustment setting.

config_autoBrightnessAmbientLightHorizon.title: The config_autoBrightnessAmbientLightHorizon Schema
config_autoBrightnessAmbientLightHorizon.description: Period of time in which to consider light samples in milliseconds.

config_autoBrightnessBrighteningLightDeb.title: The config_autoBrightnessBrighteningLightDebounce Schema
config_autoBrightnessBrighteningLightDeb.description: Stability requirements in milliseconds for accepting a new brightness level.  This is used&#10;for debouncing the light sensor.  Different constants are used to debounce the light sensor&#10;when adapting to brighter or darker environments.  This parameter controls how quickly&#10;brightness changes occur in response to an observed change in light level that exceeds the&#10;hysteresis threshold.

config_autoBrightnessButtonBacklightValu.title: The config_autoBrightnessButtonBacklightValues Schema
config_autoBrightnessButtonBacklightValu.description: Array of output values for button backlight corresponding to the LUX values&#10;in the config_autoBrightnessLevels array.  This array should have size one greater&#10;than the size of the config_autoBrightnessLevels array.&#10;The brightness values must be between 0 and 255 and be non-decreasing.&#10;This must be overridden in platform specific overlays

config_autoBrightnessInitialLightSensorR.title: The config_autoBrightnessInitialLightSensorRate Schema
config_autoBrightnessInitialLightSensorR.description: Initial light sensor event rate in milliseconds for automatic brightness control. This is&#10;used for obtaining the first light sample when the device stops dozing.&#10;&#10;Set this to 0 to disable this feature.

config_autoBrightnessKeyboardBacklightVa.title: The config_autoBrightnessKeyboardBacklightValues Schema
config_autoBrightnessKeyboardBacklightVa.description: Array of output values for keyboard backlight corresponding to the LUX values&#10;in the config_autoBrightnessLevels array.  This array should have size one greater&#10;than the size of the config_autoBrightnessLevels array.&#10;The brightness values must be between 0 and 255 and be non-decreasing.&#10;This must be overridden in platform specific overlays

config_autoBrightnessLcdBacklightValues.title: The config_autoBrightnessLcdBacklightValues Schema
config_autoBrightnessLcdBacklightValues.description: Array of output values for LCD backlight corresponding to the LUX values&#10;in the config_autoBrightnessLevels array.  This array should have size one greater&#10;than the size of the config_autoBrightnessLevels array.&#10;The brightness values must be between 0 and 255 and be non-decreasing.&#10;This must be overridden in platform specific overlays

config_autoBrightnessLevels.title: The config_autoBrightnessLevels Schema
config_autoBrightnessLevels.description: Array of light sensor LUX values to define our levels for auto backlight brightness support.&#10;The N entries of this array define N + 1 control points as follows:&#10;(1-based arrays)&#10;&#10;Point 1:   (0, value[1]):    lux &lt;= 0&#10;Point 2:     (level[1], value[2]):  0        &lt; lux &lt;= level[1]&#10;Point 3:     (level[2], value[3]):  level[2] &lt; lux &lt;= level[3]&#10;...&#10;Point N+1: (level[N], value[N+1]):  level[N] &lt; lux&#10;&#10;The control points must be strictly increasing.  Each control point&#10;corresponds to an entry in the brightness backlight values arrays.&#10;For example, if LUX == level[1] (first element of the levels array)&#10;then the brightness will be determined by value[2] (second element&#10;of the brightness values array).&#10;&#10;Spline interpolation is used to determine the auto-brightness&#10;backlight values for LUX levels between these control points.&#10;&#10;Must be overridden in platform specific overlays

config_autoBrightnessLightSensorRate.title: The config_autoBrightnessLightSensorRate Schema
config_autoBrightnessLightSensorRate.description: Light sensor event rate in milliseconds for automatic brightness control.

config_autoBrightnessResetAmbientLuxAfte.title: The config_autoBrightnessResetAmbientLuxAfterWarmUp Schema
config_autoBrightnessResetAmbientLuxAfte.description: When the screen is turned on, the previous estimate of the ambient light level at the time&#10;the screen was turned off is restored and is used to determine the initial screen&#10;brightness.&#10;&#10;If this flag is true, then the ambient light level estimate will be promptly recomputed&#10;after the warm-up interface and the screen brightness will be adjusted immediately.&#10;&#10;If this flag is false, then the ambient light level estimate will be adjusted more&#10;gradually in the same manner that normally happens when the screen is on according to the&#10;brightening or dimming debounce thresholds.  As a result, it may take somewhat longer to&#10;adapt to the environment.  This mode may be better suited for watches.

config_automatic_brightness_available.title: The config_automatic_brightness_available Schema
config_automatic_brightness_available.description: Flag indicating whether the we should enable the automatic brightness in Settings.&#10;Software implementation will be used if config_hardware_auto_brightness_available is not set

config_autoPowerModeAnyMotionSensor.title: The config_autoPowerModeAnyMotionSensor Schema
config_autoPowerModeAnyMotionSensor.description: The sensor id of an &quot;any motion&quot; sensor used in auto-power save modes.&#10;0 indicates this sensor is not available.

config_autoPowerModePreferWristTilt.title: The config_autoPowerModePreferWristTilt Schema
config_autoPowerModePreferWristTilt.description: If an any motion sensor is not available, prefer the wrist tilt detector over the&#10;SMD.

config_autoPowerModePrefetchLocation.title: The config_autoPowerModePrefetchLocation Schema
config_autoPowerModePrefetchLocation.description: If a location should be pre-fetched when going into device idle.

config_autoPowerModeThresholdAngle.title: The config_autoPowerModeThresholdAngle Schema
config_autoPowerModeThresholdAngle.description: The threshold angle for any motion detection in auto-power save modes.&#10;In hundreths of a degree.

config_autoRotationTiltTolerance.title: The config_autoRotationTiltTolerance Schema
config_autoRotationTiltTolerance.description: Sets the minimum and maximum tilt tolerance for each possible rotation.&#10;This array consists of 4 pairs of values which specify the minimum and maximum&#10;tilt angle at which the device will transition into each rotation.&#10;&#10;The tilt angle represents the direction in which the plane of the screen is facing;&#10;it is also known as the angle of elevation.&#10;&#10;  -90 degree tilt means that the screen is facing straight down&#10;(the device is being held overhead upside-down)&#10;    0 degree tilt means that the screen is facing outwards&#10;(the device is being held vertically)&#10;   90 degree tilt means that the screen is facing straight up&#10;(the device is resting on a flat table)&#10;&#10;        The default tolerances are set conservatively such that the device is more&#10;        likely to remain in its natural orientation than rotate into a counterclockwise,&#10;        clockwise, or reversed posture (with an especially strong bias against the latter)&#10;        to prevent accidental rotation while carrying the device in hand.&#10;&#10;        These thresholds may need to be tuned when the device is intended to be&#10;        mounted into a dock with a particularly shallow profile wherein rotation&#10;        would ordinarily have been suppressed.&#10;&#10;        It is helpful to consider the desired behavior both when the device is being&#10;        held at a positive tilt (typical case) vs. a negative tilt (reading overhead in&#10;        bed) since they are quite different.  In the overhead case, we typically want&#10;        the device to more strongly prefer to retain its current configuration (in absence&#10;        of a clear indication that a rotation is desired) since the user's head and neck may&#10;        be held at an unusual angle.&#10;

config_avoidGfxAccel.title: The config_avoidGfxAccel Schema
config_avoidGfxAccel.description: Device configuration indicating whether we should avoid using accelerated graphics&#10;in certain places to reduce RAM footprint.  This is ignored if ro.config.low_ram&#10;is true (in that case this is assumed true as well).  It can allow you to tune down&#10;your device's memory use without going to the point of causing applications to turn&#10;off features.

config_backPanicBehavior.title: The config_backPanicBehavior Schema
config_backPanicBehavior.description: Control the behavior when the user panic presses the back button.&#10;   0 - Nothing&#10;   1 - Go to home&#10;

config_batterySdCardAccessibility.title: The config_batterySdCardAccessibility Schema
config_batterySdCardAccessibility.description: Indicate whether the SD card is accessible without removing the battery.

config_bluetooth_address_validation.title: The config_bluetooth_address_validation Schema
config_bluetooth_address_validation.description: Boolean indicating if current platform need do one-time bluetooth address&#10;re-validation

config_bluetooth_default_profiles.title: The config_bluetooth_default_profiles Schema
config_bluetooth_default_profiles.description: Enable/disable default bluetooth profiles:&#10;        HSP_AG, ObexObjectPush, Audio, NAP

config_bluetooth_idle_cur_ma.title: The config_bluetooth_idle_cur_ma Schema
config_bluetooth_idle_cur_ma.description: Idle current for bluetooth controller. 0 by default

config_bluetooth_le_peripheral_mode_supp.title: The config_bluetooth_le_peripheral_mode_supported Schema
config_bluetooth_le_peripheral_mode_supp.description: Boolean indicating if current platform supports BLE peripheral mode

config_bluetooth_max_advertisers.title: The config_bluetooth_max_advertisers Schema
config_bluetooth_max_advertisers.description: Max number of advertisers supported by bluetooth controller. 0 if the&#10;device does not support multiple advertisement

config_bluetooth_max_scan_filters.title: The config_bluetooth_max_scan_filters Schema
config_bluetooth_max_scan_filters.description: Max number of scan filters supported by blutooth controller. 0 if the&#10;device does not support hardware scan filters

config_bluetooth_operating_voltage_mv.title: The config_bluetooth_operating_voltage_mv Schema
config_bluetooth_operating_voltage_mv.description: Operating volatage for bluetooth controller. 0 by default

config_bluetooth_reload_supported_profil.title: The config_bluetooth_reload_supported_profiles_when_enabled Schema
config_bluetooth_reload_supported_profil.description: Whether supported profiles should be reloaded upon enabling bluetooth

config_bluetooth_rx_cur_ma.title: The config_bluetooth_rx_cur_ma Schema
config_bluetooth_rx_cur_ma.description: Rx current for bluetooth controller. 0 by default

config_bluetooth_sco_off_call.title: The config_bluetooth_sco_off_call Schema
config_bluetooth_sco_off_call.description: Boolean indicating if current platform supports bluetooth SCO for off call&#10;    use cases

config_bluetooth_tx_cur_ma.title: The config_bluetooth_tx_cur_ma Schema
config_bluetooth_tx_cur_ma.description: Tx current for bluetooth controller. 0 by default

config_bluetooth_wide_band_speech.title: The config_bluetooth_wide_band_speech Schema
config_bluetooth_wide_band_speech.description: Boolean indicating if current platform supports bluetooth wide band&#10;speech

config_brightness_ramp_rate_fast.title: The config_brightness_ramp_rate_fast Schema
config_brightness_ramp_rate_fast.description: Fast brightness animation ramp rate in brightness units per second

config_brightness_ramp_rate_slow.title: The config_brightness_ramp_rate_slow Schema
config_brightness_ramp_rate_slow.description: Slow brightness animation ramp rate in brightness units per second

config_burnInProtectionMaxHorizontalOffs.title: The config_burnInProtectionMaxHorizontalOffset Schema
config_burnInProtectionMaxHorizontalOffs.description: Specifies the maximum burn-in offset horizontally.

config_burnInProtectionMaxRadius.title: The config_burnInProtectionMaxRadius Schema
config_burnInProtectionMaxRadius.description: Specifies the maximum burn-in offset displacement from the center. If -1, no maximum value&#10;will be used.

config_burnInProtectionMaxVerticalOffset.title: The config_burnInProtectionMaxVerticalOffset Schema
config_burnInProtectionMaxVerticalOffset.description: Specifies the maximum burn-in offset vertically.

config_burnInProtectionMinHorizontalOffs.title: The config_burnInProtectionMinHorizontalOffset Schema
config_burnInProtectionMinHorizontalOffs.description: Specifies the minimum burn-in offset horizontally.

config_burnInProtectionMinVerticalOffset.title: The config_burnInProtectionMinVerticalOffset Schema
config_burnInProtectionMinVerticalOffset.description: Specifies the minimum burn-in offset vertically.

config_calendarDateVibePattern.title: The config_calendarDateVibePattern Schema
config_calendarDateVibePattern.description: Vibrator pattern for feedback when selecting a day/month/year date of a Calendar

config_callBarringMMI.title: The config_callBarringMMI Schema
config_callBarringMMI.description: call barring MMI code from TS 22.030 Annex B

config_camera_sound_forced.title: The config_camera_sound_forced Schema
config_camera_sound_forced.description: Whether camera shutter sound is forced or not  (country specific).

config_cameraDoubleTapPowerGestureEnable.title: The config_cameraDoubleTapPowerGestureEnabled Schema
config_cameraDoubleTapPowerGestureEnable.description: Allow the gesture to double tap the power button twice to start the camera while the device&#10;is non-interactive.

config_cameraLaunchGestureSensorStringTy.title: The config_cameraLaunchGestureSensorStringType Schema
config_cameraLaunchGestureSensorStringTy.description: The OEM specified sensor string type for the gesture to launch camera app, this value&#10;must match the value of config_cameraLaunchGestureSensorType in OEM's HAL

config_cameraLaunchGestureSensorType.title: The config_cameraLaunchGestureSensorType Schema
config_cameraLaunchGestureSensorType.description: The OEM specified sensor type for the gesture to launch the camera app.

config_carDockEnablesAccelerometer.title: The config_carDockEnablesAccelerometer Schema
config_carDockEnablesAccelerometer.description: Control whether being in the car dock should enable accelerometer based&#10;screen orientation.  This defaults to true because putting a device in&#10;a car dock make the accelerometer more a physical input (like a lid).

config_carDockKeepsScreenOn.title: The config_carDockKeepsScreenOn Schema
config_carDockKeepsScreenOn.description: Control whether being in the car dock (and powered) always&#10;keeps the screen on.  By default it stays on when plugged in to&#10;AC.  0 will not keep it on; or together 1 to stay on when plugged&#10;in to AC and 2 to stay on when plugged in to USB.  (So 3 for both.)

config_carDockRotation.title: The config_carDockRotation Schema
config_carDockRotation.description: The number of degrees to rotate the display when the device is in a car dock.&#10;A value of -1 means no change in orientation by default.

config_carrier_volte_available.title: The config_carrier_volte_available Schema
config_carrier_volte_available.description: Flag specifying whether VoLTE should be available for carrier: independent of&#10;carrier provisioning. If false: hard disabled. If true: then depends on carrier&#10;provisioning, availability etc

config_carrier_volte_provisioned.title: The config_carrier_volte_provisioned Schema
config_carrier_volte_provisioned.description: Flag specifying whether VoLTE availability is based on provisioning

config_carrier_volte_tty_supported.title: The config_carrier_volte_tty_supported Schema
config_carrier_volte_tty_supported.description: Flag specifying whether VoLTE TTY is supported

config_carrier_vt_available.title: The config_carrier_vt_available Schema
config_carrier_vt_available.description: Flag specifying whether VT should be available for carrier: independent of&#10;carrier provisioning. If false: hard disabled. If true: then depends on carrier&#10;provisioning, availability etc

config_carrier_wfc_ims_available.title: The config_carrier_wfc_ims_available Schema
config_carrier_wfc_ims_available.description: Flag specifying whether WFC over IMS should be available for carrier: independent of&#10;carrier provisioning. If false: hard disabled. If true: then depends on carrier&#10;provisioning, availability etc

config_carrierDemoModePackages.title: The config_carrierDemoModePackages Schema
config_carrierDemoModePackages.description: List of packages to enable in carrier demo mode (comma separated).

config_carrierDemoModePassword.title: The config_carrierDemoModePassword Schema
config_carrierDemoModePassword.description: Hashed password (SHA-256) used to restrict carrier demo mode operation.

config_carrierDemoModeSetting.title: The config_carrierDemoModeSetting Schema
config_carrierDemoModeSetting.description: Secure setting used to activate carrier demo mode.

config_cdma_3waycall_flash_delay.title: The config_cdma_3waycall_flash_delay Schema
config_cdma_3waycall_flash_delay.description: Sprint need a 70 ms delay for 3way call

config_cdma_dun_supported_types.title: The config_cdma_dun_supported_types Schema
config_cdma_dun_supported_types.description: a DUN-requiring CDMA device, the DUN APN will just support just DUN.

config_cdma_international_roaming_indica.title: The config_cdma_international_roaming_indicators Schema
config_cdma_international_roaming_indica.description: An array of CDMA roaming indicators which means international roaming

config_cell_retries_per_error_code.title: The config_cell_retries_per_error_code Schema
config_cell_retries_per_error_code.description: Number of retries Cell Data should attempt for a given error code before&#10;restarting the modem.&#10;Error codes not listed will not lead to modem restarts.&#10;Array of &quot;code#,retry#&quot;

config_cellBroadcastAppLinks.title: The config_cellBroadcastAppLinks Schema
config_cellBroadcastAppLinks.description: Set to true to add links to Cell Broadcast app from Settings and MMS app.

config_chooseAccountActivity.title: The config_chooseAccountActivity Schema
config_chooseAccountActivity.description: Class name of the framework account picker activity.&#10;Can be customized for other product types

config_chooseTypeAndAccountActivity.title: The config_chooseTypeAndAccountActivity Schema
config_chooseTypeAndAccountActivity.description: Class name of the account type and account picker activity.&#10;Can be customized for other product types

config_clockTickVibePattern.title: The config_clockTickVibePattern Schema
config_clockTickVibePattern.description: Vibrator pattern for feedback when selecting an hour/minute tick of a Clock

config_closeDialogWhenTouchOutside.title: The config_closeDialogWhenTouchOutside Schema
config_closeDialogWhenTouchOutside.description: Whether dialogs should close automatically when the user touches outside&#10;of them.  This should not normally be modified.

config_comboNetworkLocationProvider.title: The config_comboNetworkLocationProvider Schema
config_comboNetworkLocationProvider.description: Component name of the combo network location provider.

config_contextClickVibePattern.title: The config_contextClickVibePattern Schema
config_contextClickVibePattern.description: Vibrator pattern for feedback about a context click

config_convert_to_emergency_number_map.title: The config_convert_to_emergency_number_map Schema
config_convert_to_emergency_number_map.description: This config is holding calling number conversion map - expected to convert to emergency&#10;number. Formats for this config as below:&#10;&lt;item&gt;[dialstring1],[dialstring2],[dialstring3]:[replacement]&lt;/item&gt;&#10;&#10;E.g. for Taiwan Type Approval, 110 and 119 should be converted to 112.&#10;&lt;item&gt;110,119:112&lt;/item&gt;&#10;

config_criticalBatteryWarningLevel.title: The config_criticalBatteryWarningLevel Schema
config_criticalBatteryWarningLevel.description: Display low battery warning when battery level dips to this value.&#10;Also, the battery stats are flushed to disk when we hit this level.

config_cursorWindowSize.title: The config_cursorWindowSize Schema
config_cursorWindowSize.description: When a database query is executed, the results retuned are paginated&#10;in pages of size (in KB) indicated by this value

config_customAdbPublicKeyConfirmationCom.title: The config_customAdbPublicKeyConfirmationComponent Schema
config_customAdbPublicKeyConfirmationCom.description: Name of the activity or service that prompts the user to reject, accept, or whitelist&#10;an adb host's public key, when an unwhitelisted host connects to the local adbd.&#10;Can be customized for other product types

config_customAdbPublicKeyConfirmationSec.title: The config_customAdbPublicKeyConfirmationSecondaryUserComponent Schema
config_customAdbPublicKeyConfirmationSec.description: Name of the activity that prompts the secondary user to acknowledge she/he needs to&#10;switch to the primary user to enable USB debugging.&#10;Can be customized for other product types

config_customResolverActivity.title: The config_customResolverActivity Schema
config_customResolverActivity.description: Component name of a custom ResolverActivity (Intent resolver) to be used instead of&#10;the default framework version. If left empty, then the framework version will be used.&#10;Example: com.google.android.myapp/.resolver.MyResolverActivity

config_customVpnConfirmDialogComponent.title: The config_customVpnConfirmDialogComponent Schema
config_customVpnConfirmDialogComponent.description: Name of the CustomDialog that is used for VPN

config_datause_iface.title: The config_datause_iface Schema
config_datause_iface.description: The default iface on which to monitor data use

config_datause_threshold_bytes.title: The config_datause_threshold_bytes Schema
config_datause_threshold_bytes.description: The default data-use threshold in bytes. 0 disables

config_datause_throttle_kbitsps.title: The config_datause_throttle_kbitsps Schema
config_datause_throttle_kbitsps.description: The default reduced-datarate value in kilobits per sec

config_default_dns_server.title: The config_default_dns_server Schema
config_default_dns_server.description: IP address of the dns server to use if nobody else suggests one

config_default_vm_number.title: The config_default_vm_number Schema
config_default_vm_number.description: If there is no preload VM number in the sim card, carriers such as&#10;Verizon require to load a default vm number from the configurantion.&#10;Define config_default_vm_number for this purpose. And there are two&#10;optional formats for this configuration as below:&#10;(1)&lt;item&gt;voicemail number&lt;/item&gt;&#10;(2)&lt;item&gt;voicemail number;gid&lt;/item&gt;&#10;The logic to pick up the correct voicemail number:&#10;(1) If the config_default_vm_number array has no gid special item, the last one will be&#10;picked&#10;(2) If the config_default_vm_number array has gid special item and  it matches the current&#10;sim's gid, it will be picked.&#10;(3) If the config_default_vm_number array has gid special item but it doesn't match the&#10;current sim's gid, the last one without gid will be picked

config_defaultDisplayDefaultColorMode.title: The config_defaultDisplayDefaultColorMode Schema
config_defaultDisplayDefaultColorMode.description: The default mode for the default display. One of the following values (See Display.java):&#10;    0 - COLOR_MODE_DEFAULT&#10;    7 - COLOR_MODE_SRGB&#10;

config_defaultDndAccessPackages.title: The config_defaultDndAccessPackages Schema
config_defaultDndAccessPackages.description: Colon separated list of package names that should be granted DND access

config_defaultFirstUserRestrictions.title: The config_defaultFirstUserRestrictions Schema
config_defaultFirstUserRestrictions.description: User restrictions set when the first user is created.&#10;Note: Also update appropriate overlay files.

config_defaultInTouchMode.title: The config_defaultInTouchMode Schema
config_defaultInTouchMode.description: Whether to start in touch mode

config_defaultNetworkScorerPackageName.title: The config_defaultNetworkScorerPackageName Schema
config_defaultNetworkScorerPackageName.description: Package name for default network scorer app; overridden by product overlays.

config_defaultNightDisplayAutoMode.title: The config_defaultNightDisplayAutoMode Schema
config_defaultNightDisplayAutoMode.description: Default mode to control how Night display is automatically activated.&#10;One of the following values (see NightDisplayController.java):&#10;    0 - AUTO_MODE_DISABLED&#10;    1 - AUTO_MODE_CUSTOM&#10;    2 - AUTO_MODE_TWILIGHT&#10;

config_defaultNightDisplayCustomEndTime.title: The config_defaultNightDisplayCustomEndTime Schema
config_defaultNightDisplayCustomEndTime.description: Default time when Night display is automatically deactivated.&#10;Represented as milliseconds from midnight (e.g. 21600000 == 6am).

config_defaultNightDisplayCustomStartTim.title: The config_defaultNightDisplayCustomStartTime Schema
config_defaultNightDisplayCustomStartTim.description: Default time when Night display is automatically activated.&#10;Represented as milliseconds from midnight (e.g. 79200000 == 10pm).

config_defaultNightMode.title: The config_defaultNightMode Schema
config_defaultNightMode.description: Control the default night mode to use when there is no other mode override set.&#10;One of the following values (see UiModeManager.java):&#10;    0 - MODE_NIGHT_AUTO&#10;    1 - MODE_NIGHT_NO&#10;    2 - MODE_NIGHT_YES&#10;

config_defaultNotificationLedOff.title: The config_defaultNotificationLedOff Schema
config_defaultNotificationLedOff.description: Default LED off time for notification LED in milliseconds.

config_defaultNotificationLedOn.title: The config_defaultNotificationLedOn Schema
config_defaultNotificationLedOn.description: Default LED on time for notification LED in milliseconds.

config_defaultNotificationVibePattern.title: The config_defaultNotificationVibePattern Schema
config_defaultNotificationVibePattern.description: Vibrator pattern to be used as the default for notifications&#10;that specify DEFAULT_VIBRATE.&#10;

config_defaultPictureInPictureBounds.title: The config_defaultPictureInPictureBounds Schema
config_defaultPictureInPictureBounds.description: Default bounds [left top right bottom] on screen for picture-in-picture windows.

config_defaultPinnerServiceFiles.title: The config_defaultPinnerServiceFiles Schema
config_defaultPinnerServiceFiles.description: Default files to pin via Pinner Service

config_defaultUiModeType.title: The config_defaultUiModeType Schema
config_defaultUiModeType.description: Control the default UI mode type to use when there is no other type override&#10;happening.  One of the following values (See Configuration.java):&#10;    1  UI_MODE_TYPE_NORMAL&#10;    4  UI_MODE_TYPE_TELEVISION&#10;    5  UI_MODE_TYPE_APPLIANCE&#10;    6  UI_MODE_TYPE_WATCH&#10;Any other values will have surprising consequences.

config_defaultWindowFeatureOptionsPanel.title: The config_defaultWindowFeatureOptionsPanel Schema
config_defaultWindowFeatureOptionsPanel.description: Flags enabling default window features. See Window.java

config_demoModeLauncherComponent.title: The config_demoModeLauncherComponent Schema
config_demoModeLauncherComponent.description: Component that is the default launcher when demo mode is enabled.

config_deskDockEnablesAccelerometer.title: The config_deskDockEnablesAccelerometer Schema
config_deskDockEnablesAccelerometer.description: Control whether being in the desk dock should enable accelerometer&#10;based screen orientation.  This defaults to true because it is&#10;common for desk docks to be sold in a variety of form factors&#10;with different orientations.  Since we cannot always tell these docks&#10;apart and the docks cannot report their true orientation on their own,&#10;we rely on gravity to determine the effective orientation.

config_deskDockKeepsScreenOn.title: The config_deskDockKeepsScreenOn Schema
config_deskDockKeepsScreenOn.description: Control whether being in the desk dock (and powered) always&#10;keeps the screen on.  By default it stays on when plugged in to&#10;AC.  0 will not keep it on; or together 1 to stay on when plugged&#10;in to AC and 2 to stay on when plugged in to USB.  (So 3 for both.)

config_deskDockRotation.title: The config_deskDockRotation Schema
config_deskDockRotation.description: The number of degrees to rotate the display when the device is in a desk dock.&#10;A value of -1 means no change in orientation by default.

config_device_respects_hold_carrier_conf.title: The config_device_respects_hold_carrier_config Schema
config_device_respects_hold_carrier_conf.description: Flag specifying whether the device will use the &quot;allow_hold_in_ims_call&quot; carrier config&#10;option.  When false, the device will support holding of IMS calls, regardless of the&#10;carrier config setting.

config_device_volte_available.title: The config_device_volte_available Schema
config_device_volte_available.description: Flag specifying whether VoLTE is available on device

config_device_vt_available.title: The config_device_vt_available Schema
config_device_vt_available.description: Flag specifying whether VT is available on device

config_device_wfc_ims_available.title: The config_device_wfc_ims_available Schema
config_device_wfc_ims_available.description: Flag specifying whether WFC over IMS is available on device

config_deviceProvisioningPackage.title: The config_deviceProvisioningPackage Schema
config_deviceProvisioningPackage.description: Package name for the device provisioning package.

config_dimBehindFadeDuration.title: The config_dimBehindFadeDuration Schema
config_dimBehindFadeDuration.description: Duration for the dim animation behind a dialog.  This may be either&#10;a percentage, which is relative to the duration of the enter/open&#10;animation of the window being shown that is dimming behind, or it may&#10;be an integer for a constant duration.

config_disabledUntilUsedPreinstalledCarr.title: The config_disabledUntilUsedPreinstalledCarrierApps Schema
config_disabledUntilUsedPreinstalledCarr.description: The list of carrier applications which should be disabled until used.&#10;This function suppresses update notifications for these pre-installed apps.&#10;In SubscriptionInfoUpdater, the listed applications are disabled until used when all of the&#10;following conditions are met.&#10;1. Not currently carrier-privileged according to the inserted SIM&#10;2. Pre-installed&#10;3. In the default state (enabled but not explicitly)&#10;And SubscriptionInfoUpdater undoes this and marks the app enabled when a SIM is inserted&#10;that marks the app as carrier privileged. It also grants the app default permissions&#10;for Phone and Location. As such, apps MUST only ever be added to this list if they&#10;obtain user consent to access their location through other means.

config_disabledUntilUsedPreinstalledImes.title: The config_disabledUntilUsedPreinstalledImes Schema
config_disabledUntilUsedPreinstalledImes.description: The list of IMEs which should be disabled until used.&#10;This function suppresses update notifications for these pre-installed apps.&#10;We need to set this configuration carefully that they should not have functionarities&#10;other than &quot;IME&quot; or &quot;Spell Checker&quot;. In InputMethodManagerService,&#10;the listed IMEs are disabled until used when all of the following conditions are met.&#10;1. Not selected as an enabled IME in the Settings&#10;2. Not selected as a spell checker in the Settings&#10;3. Installed&#10;4. A pre-installed IME&#10;5. Not enabled&#10;And the disabled_until_used state for an IME is released by InputMethodManagerService&#10;when the IME is selected as an enabled IME.

config_disableMenuKeyInLockScreen.title: The config_disableMenuKeyInLockScreen Schema
config_disableMenuKeyInLockScreen.description: Allow the menu hard key to be disabled in LockScreen on some devices

config_disablePacking.title: The config_disablePacking Schema
config_disablePacking.description: Whether disablepacking is enabled or not

config_disableUsbPermissionDialogs.title: The config_disableUsbPermissionDialogs Schema
config_disableUsbPermissionDialogs.description: If true, then we do not ask user for permission for apps to connect to USB devices.&#10;Do not set this to true for production devices. Doing so will cause you to fail CTS.

config_dockedStackDividerSnapMode.title: The config_dockedStackDividerSnapMode Schema
config_dockedStackDividerSnapMode.description: Controls the snap mode for the docked stack divider&#10;    0 - 3 snap targets: left/top has 16:9 ratio, 1:1, and right/bottom has 16:9 ratio&#10;    1 - 3 snap targets: fixed ratio, 1:1, (1 - fixed ratio)&#10;    2 - 1 snap target: 1:1&#10;

config_dontPreferApn.title: The config_dontPreferApn Schema
config_dontPreferApn.description: Set to true if we need to not prefer an APN.&#10;This is being added to enable a simple scenario of pre-paid&#10;provisioning on some carriers, working around a bug (7305641)&#10;where if the preferred is used we don't try the others.

config_doublePressOnPowerBehavior.title: The config_doublePressOnPowerBehavior Schema
config_doublePressOnPowerBehavior.description: Control the behavior when the user double presses the power button.&#10;   0 - Nothing&#10;   1 - Toggle theater mode setting&#10;   2 - Brightness boost&#10;

config_doubleTapOnHomeBehavior.title: The config_doubleTapOnHomeBehavior Schema
config_doubleTapOnHomeBehavior.description: Control the behavior when the user double-taps the home button.&#10;   0 - Nothing&#10;   1 - Recent apps view in SystemUI&#10;This needs to match the constants in&#10;policy/src/com/android/internal/policy/impl/PhoneWindowManager.java&#10;

config_doubleTouchGestureEnableFile.title: The config_doubleTouchGestureEnableFile Schema
config_doubleTouchGestureEnableFile.description: File used to enable the double touch gesture.&#10;TODO: move to input HAL once ready.

config_downloadDataDirLowSpaceThreshold.title: The config_downloadDataDirLowSpaceThreshold Schema
config_downloadDataDirLowSpaceThreshold.description: When the free space available in DownloadManager's data dir falls&#10;below the percentage value specified by this param, DownloadManager&#10;starts removing files to try to make percentage of available&#10;free space above this threshold value.

config_downloadDataDirSize.title: The config_downloadDataDirSize Schema
config_downloadDataDirSize.description: Max space (in MB) allocated to DownloadManager to store the downloaded&#10;files if they are to be stored in DownloadManager's data dir,&#10;which typically is /data/data/com.android.providers.downloads/files

config_dozeAfterScreenOff.title: The config_dozeAfterScreenOff Schema
config_dozeAfterScreenOff.description: If true, the doze component is not started until after the screen has been&#10;turned off and the screen off animation has been performed.

config_dozeBrightnessBacklightValues.title: The config_dozeBrightnessBacklightValues Schema
config_dozeBrightnessBacklightValues.description: Array of values for determining screen brightness for devices that have both an ambient&#10;light sensor and the screen on while dozing. The length of this array is assumed to be one&#10;greater than config_dozeModeSensorLuxLevels if they are not both empty. See the&#10;config_dozeModeSensorLuxLevels description for how the backlight value is chosen.

config_dozeComponent.title: The config_dozeComponent Schema
config_dozeComponent.description: ComponentName of a dream to show whenever the system would otherwise have&#10;gone to sleep.  When the PowerManager is asked to go to sleep, it will instead&#10;try to start this dream if possible.  The dream should typically call startDozing()&#10;to put the display into a low power state and allow the application processor&#10;to be suspended.  When the dream ends, the system will go to sleep as usual.&#10;Specify the component name or an empty string if none.&#10;&#10;Note that doze dreams are not subject to the same start conditions as ordinary dreams.&#10;Doze dreams will run whenever the power manager is in a dozing state.

config_dozeDoubleTapSensorType.title: The config_dozeDoubleTapSensorType Schema
config_dozeDoubleTapSensorType.description: Type of the double tap sensor. Empty if double tap is not supported.

config_dozePulsePickup.title: The config_dozePulsePickup Schema
config_dozePulsePickup.description: Doze: should the TYPE_PICK_UP_GESTURE sensor be used as a pulse signal.

config_dozeSensorLuxLevels.title: The config_dozeSensorLuxLevels Schema
config_dozeSensorLuxLevels.description: Array of ambient light sensor lux threshold values for determining screen brightness for&#10;devices that have both an ambient light sensor and the screen on while dozing. This is&#10;used to determine the screen brightness while dozing by calculating the index to use for&#10;lookup and then setting the screen brightness value to the corresponding value of&#10;config_dozeBrightnessBacklightValues.&#10;&#10;The (zero-based) index is calculated as follows: (MAX is the largest index of the array)&#10;condition    calculated index&#10;value &lt; lux[0]        0&#10;lux[n] &lt;= value &lt; lux[n+1]     n+1&#10;lux[MAX] &lt;= value     MAX+1

config_drawLockTimeoutMillis.title: The config_drawLockTimeoutMillis Schema
config_drawLockTimeoutMillis.description: Number of milliseconds to hold a wake lock to ensure that drawing is fully&#10;flushed to the display while dozing.  This value needs to be large enough&#10;to account for processing and rendering time plus a frame or two of latency&#10;in the display pipeline plus some slack just to be sure.

config_dreamsActivatedOnDockByDefault.title: The config_dreamsActivatedOnDockByDefault Schema
config_dreamsActivatedOnDockByDefault.description: If supported and enabled, are dreams activated when docked? (by default)

config_dreamsActivatedOnSleepByDefault.title: The config_dreamsActivatedOnSleepByDefault Schema
config_dreamsActivatedOnSleepByDefault.description: If supported and enabled, are dreams activated when asleep and charging? (by default)

config_dreamsBatteryLevelDrainCutoff.title: The config_dreamsBatteryLevelDrainCutoff Schema
config_dreamsBatteryLevelDrainCutoff.description: If the battery level drops by this percentage and the user activity timeout&#10;has expired, then assume the device is receiving insufficient current to charge&#10;effectively and terminate the dream.  Use -1 to disable this safety feature.

config_dreamsBatteryLevelMinimumWhenNotP.title: The config_dreamsBatteryLevelMinimumWhenNotPowered Schema
config_dreamsBatteryLevelMinimumWhenNotP.description: Minimum battery level to allow dreaming when not powered.&#10;Use -1 to disable this safety feature.

config_dreamsBatteryLevelMinimumWhenPowe.title: The config_dreamsBatteryLevelMinimumWhenPowered Schema
config_dreamsBatteryLevelMinimumWhenPowe.description: Minimum battery level to allow dreaming when powered.&#10;Use -1 to disable this safety feature.

config_dreamsEnabledByDefault.title: The config_dreamsEnabledByDefault Schema
config_dreamsEnabledByDefault.description: If supported, are dreams enabled? (by default)

config_dreamsEnabledOnBattery.title: The config_dreamsEnabledOnBattery Schema
config_dreamsEnabledOnBattery.description: Are we allowed to dream while not plugged in?

config_dreamsSupported.title: The config_dreamsSupported Schema
config_dreamsSupported.description: Specifies whether the dreams feature should be supported.&#10;When true, the system will allow the user to configure dreams (screensavers)&#10;to launch when a user activity timeout occurs or the system is told to nap.&#10;When false, the dreams feature will be disabled (this does not affect dozing).&#10;&#10;Consider setting this resource to false or disabling dreams by default when a&#10;doze component is specified below since dreaming will supercede dozing and&#10;will prevent the system from entering a low power state until the dream ends.

config_duplicate_port_omadm_wappush.title: The config_duplicate_port_omadm_wappush Schema
config_duplicate_port_omadm_wappush.description: If this value is true, duplicate Source/Destination port fields&#10;in WDP header of some carriers OMADM wap push are supported.&#10;ex: MSGTYPE-TotalSegments-CurrentSegment&#10;    -SourcePortDestPort-SourcePortDestPort-OMADM PDU&#10;If false, not supported.

config_dynamicHysteresisBrightLevels.title: The config_dynamicHysteresisBrightLevels Schema
config_dynamicHysteresisBrightLevels.description: Array of hysteresis constraint values for brightening, represented as tenths of a&#10;percent. The length of this array is assumed to be one greater than&#10;config_dynamicHysteresisLuxLevels. The brightening threshold is calculated as&#10;lux * (1.0f + CONSTRAINT_VALUE). When the current lux is higher than this threshold,&#10;the screen brightness is recalculated. See the config_dynamicHysteresisLuxLevels&#10;description for how the constraint value is chosen.

config_dynamicHysteresisDarkLevels.title: The config_dynamicHysteresisDarkLevels Schema
config_dynamicHysteresisDarkLevels.description: Array of hysteresis constraint values for darkening, represented as tenths of a&#10;percent. The length of this array is assumed to be one greater than&#10;config_dynamicHysteresisLuxLevels. The darkening threshold is calculated as&#10;lux * (1.0f - CONSTRAINT_VALUE). When the current lux is lower than this threshold,&#10;the screen brightness is recalculated. See the config_dynamicHysteresisLuxLevels&#10;description for how the constraint value is chosen.

config_dynamicHysteresisLuxLevels.title: The config_dynamicHysteresisLuxLevels Schema
config_dynamicHysteresisLuxLevels.description: Array of ambient lux threshold values. This is used for determining hysteresis constraint&#10;values by calculating the index to use for lookup and then setting the constraint value&#10;to the corresponding value of the array. The new brightening hysteresis constraint value&#10;is the n-th element of config_dynamicHysteresisBrightLevels, and the new darkening&#10;hysteresis constraint value is the n-th element of config_dynamicHysteresisDarkLevels.&#10;&#10;The (zero-based) index is calculated as follows: (MAX is the largest index of the array)&#10;condition    calculated index&#10;value &lt; lux[0]        0&#10;lux[n] &lt;= value &lt; lux[n+1]     n+1&#10;lux[MAX] &lt;= value     MAX+1

config_eap_sim_based_auth_supported.title: The config_eap_sim_based_auth_supported Schema
config_eap_sim_based_auth_supported.description: Flag indicating device support for EAP SIM, AKA, AKA'

config_emergency_call_number.title: The config_emergency_call_number Schema
config_emergency_call_number.description: emergency call number for the emergency affordance

config_emergency_mcc_codes.title: The config_emergency_mcc_codes Schema
config_emergency_mcc_codes.description: Do not translate. Mcc codes whose existence trigger the presence of emergency&#10;affordances

config_emergencyCallOnPowerkeyTapGesture.title: The config_emergencyCallOnPowerkeyTapGestureEnabled Schema
config_emergencyCallOnPowerkeyTapGesture.description: Allow the gesture to tap the power button N times to start&#10;the Emergency Call while the device is non-interactive.

config_enable_emergency_call_while_sim_l.title: The config_enable_emergency_call_while_sim_locked Schema
config_enable_emergency_call_while_sim_l.description: Enable emergency call when sim is locked or puk locked. Some countries/carriers do not&#10;allow emergency calls to be placed without the IMSI, which is locked in the SIM.&#10;If so, this should be set to 'false' in an overlay.

config_enable_puk_unlock_screen.title: The config_enable_puk_unlock_screen Schema
config_enable_puk_unlock_screen.description: Enable puk unlockscreen by default.&#10;If unlock screen is disabled, the puk should be unlocked through Emergency Dialer

config_enableActivityRecognitionHardware.title: The config_enableActivityRecognitionHardwareOverlay Schema
config_enableActivityRecognitionHardware.description: Whether to enable Hardware Activity-Recognition overlay which allows Hardware&#10;Activity-Recognition to be replaced by an app at run-time. When disabled, only the&#10;config_activityRecognitionHardwarePackageName package will be searched for&#10;its implementation, otherwise packages whose signature matches the&#10;signatures of config_locationProviderPackageNames will be searched, and&#10;the service with the highest version number will be picked. Anyone who&#10;wants to disable the overlay mechanism can set it to false.&#10;

config_enableAppWidgetService.title: The config_enableAppWidgetService Schema
config_enableAppWidgetService.description: True if the device requires AppWidgetService even if it does not have&#10;the PackageManager.FEATURE_APP_WIDGETS feature

config_enableAutoPowerModes.title: The config_enableAutoPowerModes Schema
config_enableAutoPowerModes.description: Set this to true to enable the platform's auto-power-save modes like doze and&#10;app standby.  These are not enabled by default because they require a standard&#10;cloud-to-device messaging service for apps to interact correctly with the modes&#10;(such as to be able to deliver an instant message to the device even when it is&#10;dozing).  This should be enabled if you have such services and expect apps to&#10;correctly use them when installed on your device.  Otherwise, keep this disabled&#10;so that applications can still use their own mechanisms.

config_enableBurnInProtection.title: The config_enableBurnInProtection Schema
config_enableBurnInProtection.description: If true, the display will be shifted around in ambient mode.

config_enableCarDockHomeLaunch.title: The config_enableCarDockHomeLaunch Schema
config_enableCarDockHomeLaunch.description: Control whether to launch Car dock home app when user presses home button or when&#10; car dock intent is fired.&#10; In mobile device, usually separate home app is expected in car mode, and this should be&#10; enabled. But in environments like real car, default home app may be enough, and in that&#10; case, this can be disabled (set to false).

config_enableCpuBoostForAppLaunch.title: The config_enableCpuBoostForAppLaunch Schema
config_enableCpuBoostForAppLaunch.description: Whether cpu boost is enabled for AppLaunch

config_enableCpuBoostForOverScrollerFlin.title: The config_enableCpuBoostForOverScrollerFling Schema
config_enableCpuBoostForOverScrollerFlin.description: Whether cpu boost is enabled for overscroller fling.

config_enableCpuBoostForScroller.title: The config_enableCpuBoostForScroller Schema
config_enableCpuBoostForScroller.description: Whether cpu boost is enabled for horizontal scroll.

config_enableFreqAggr.title: The config_enableFreqAggr Schema
config_enableFreqAggr.description: Whether cpu freq aggr is enabled for AppLaunch

config_enableFusedLocationOverlay.title: The config_enableFusedLocationOverlay Schema
config_enableFusedLocationOverlay.description: Whether to enable fused location provider overlay which allows fused&#10;location provider to be replaced by an app at run-time. When disabled,&#10;only the config_fusedLocationProviderPackageName package will be&#10;searched for fused location provider, otherwise packages whose&#10;signature matches the signatures of config_locationProviderPackageNames&#10;will be searched, and the service with the highest version number will&#10;be picked. Anyone who wants to disable the overlay mechanism can set it&#10;to false.&#10;

config_enableGeocoderOverlay.title: The config_enableGeocoderOverlay Schema
config_enableGeocoderOverlay.description: Whether to enable geocoder overlay which allows geocoder to be replaced&#10;by an app at run-time. When disabled, only the&#10;config_geocoderProviderPackageName package will be searched for&#10;geocoder, otherwise packages whose signature matches the signatures of&#10;config_locationProviderPackageNames will be searched, and the service&#10;with the highest version number will be picked. Anyone who wants to&#10;disable the overlay mechanism can set it to false.&#10;

config_enableGeofenceOverlay.title: The config_enableGeofenceOverlay Schema
config_enableGeofenceOverlay.description: Whether to enable geofence overlay which allows geofence to be replaced&#10;by an app at run-time. When disabled, only the&#10;config_geofenceProviderPackageName package will be searched for&#10;geofence implementation, otherwise packages whose signature matches the&#10;signatures of config_locationProviderPackageNames will be searched, and&#10;the service with the highest version number will be picked. Anyone who&#10;wants to disable the overlay mechanism can set it to false.&#10;

config_enableHardwareFlpOverlay.title: The config_enableHardwareFlpOverlay Schema
config_enableHardwareFlpOverlay.description: Whether to enable Hardware FLP overlay which allows Hardware FLP to be&#10;replaced by an app at run-time. When disabled, only the&#10;config_hardwareFlpPackageName package will be searched for Hardware Flp,&#10;otherwise packages whose signature matches the signatures of&#10;config_locationProviderPackageNames will be searched, and the service&#10;with the highest version number will be picked. Anyone who wants to&#10;disable the overlay mechanism can set it to false.&#10;

config_enableLaunchBoostv2.title: The config_enableLaunchBoostv2 Schema
config_enableLaunchBoostv2.description: Whether cpu freq aggr is enabled for AppLaunch

config_enableLockBeforeUnlockScreen.title: The config_enableLockBeforeUnlockScreen Schema
config_enableLockBeforeUnlockScreen.description: Don't show lock screen before unlock screen (PIN/pattern/password)

config_enableLockScreenTranslucentDecor.title: The config_enableLockScreenTranslucentDecor Schema
config_enableLockScreenTranslucentDecor.description: Enable lockscreen translucent decor by default

config_enableMultiUserUI.title: The config_enableMultiUserUI Schema
config_enableMultiUserUI.description: Whether UI for multi user should be shown

config_enableNetworkLocationOverlay.title: The config_enableNetworkLocationOverlay Schema
config_enableNetworkLocationOverlay.description: Whether to enable network location overlay which allows network&#10;location provider to be replaced by an app at run-time. When disabled,&#10;only the config_networkLocationProviderPackageName package will be&#10;searched for network location provider, otherwise packages whose&#10;signature matches the signatures of config_locationProviderPackageNames&#10;will be searched, and the service with the highest version number will&#10;be picked. Anyone who wants to disable the overlay mechanism can set it&#10;to false.&#10;

config_enablePerfBoostForAnimation.title: The config_enablePerfBoostForAnimation Schema
config_enablePerfBoostForAnimation.description: Whether cpu boost is enabled for animation.

config_enableScreenshotChord.title: The config_enableScreenshotChord Schema
config_enableScreenshotChord.description: If this is true, key chords can be used to take a screenshot on the device.

config_enableWifiDisplay.title: The config_enableWifiDisplay Schema
config_enableWifiDisplay.description: Whether WiFi display is supported by this device.&#10;There are many prerequisites for this feature to work correctly.&#10;Here are a few of them:&#10;* The WiFi radio must support WiFi P2P.&#10;* The WiFi radio must support concurrent connections to the WiFi display and&#10;  to an access point.&#10;* The Audio Flinger audio_policy.conf file must specify a rule for the &quot;r_submix&quot;&#10;  remote submix module.  This module is used to record and stream system&#10;  audio output to the WiFi display encoder in the media server.&#10;* The remote submix module &quot;audio.r_submix.default&quot; must be installed on the device.&#10;* The device must be provisioned with HDCP keys (for protected content).&#10;

config_ephemeralResolverPackage.title: The config_ephemeralResolverPackage Schema
config_ephemeralResolverPackage.description: A list of potential packages, in priority order, that may contain an&#10;ephemeral resolver. Each package will be be queried for a component&#10;that has been granted the PACKAGE_EPHEMERAL_AGENT permission.&#10;This may be empty if ephemeral apps are not supported.

config_ethernet_tcp_buffers.title: The config_ethernet_tcp_buffers Schema
config_ethernet_tcp_buffers.description: Configure ethernet tcp buffersizes in the form:&#10;rmem_min,rmem_def,rmem_max,wmem_min,wmem_def,wmem_max

config_externalHardKeyboardBehavior.title: The config_externalHardKeyboardBehavior Schema
config_externalHardKeyboardBehavior.description: Controls how we deal with externally connected physical keyboards.&#10;0 - When using this device, it is not clear for users to recognize when the physical&#10;    keyboard is (should be) connected and when it is (should be) disconnected.  Most of&#10;    phones and tablets with Bluetooth keyboard would fall into this category because the&#10;    connected Bluetooth keyboard may or may not be nearby the host device.&#10;1 - When using this device, it is clear for users to recognize when the physical&#10;    keyboard is (should be) connected and when it is (should be) disconnected.&#10;    Devices with wired USB keyboard is one clear example.  Some 2-in-1 convertible&#10;    tablets with dedicated keyboards may have the same affordance to wired USB keyboard.&#10;

config_extraFreeKbytesAbsolute.title: The config_extraFreeKbytesAbsolute Schema
config_extraFreeKbytesAbsolute.description: Device configuration setting the /proc/sys/vm/extra_free_kbytes tunable in the kernel&#10;(if it exists).  A high value will increase the amount of memory that the kernel&#10;tries to keep free, reducing allocation time and causing the lowmemorykiller to kill&#10;earlier.  A low value allows more memory to be used by processes but may cause more&#10;allocations to block waiting on disk I/O or lowmemorykiller.  Overrides the default&#10;value chosen by ActivityManager based on screen size.  0 prevents keeping any extra&#10;memory over what the kernel keeps by default.  -1 keeps the default.

config_extraFreeKbytesAdjust.title: The config_extraFreeKbytesAdjust Schema
config_extraFreeKbytesAdjust.description: Device configuration adjusting the /proc/sys/vm/extra_free_kbytes tunable in the kernel&#10;(if it exists).  0 uses the default value chosen by ActivityManager.  A positive value&#10;will increase the amount of memory that the kernel tries to keep free, reducing&#10;allocation time and causing the lowmemorykiller to kill earlier.  A negative value&#10;allows more memory to be used by processes but may cause more allocations to block&#10;waiting on disk I/O or lowmemorykiller.  Directly added to the default value chosen by&#10;ActivityManager based on screen size.

config_fingerprintMaxTemplatesPerUser.title: The config_fingerprintMaxTemplatesPerUser Schema
config_fingerprintMaxTemplatesPerUser.description: For performance and storage reasons, limit the number of fingerprints per user

config_focusScrollContainersInTouchMode.title: The config_focusScrollContainersInTouchMode Schema
config_focusScrollContainersInTouchMode.description: Default value for android:focusableInTouchMode for some framework scrolling containers.&#10;ListView/GridView are notably absent since this is their default anyway.&#10;Set to true for watch devices.

config_forceDefaultOrientation.title: The config_forceDefaultOrientation Schema
config_forceDefaultOrientation.description: Flag indicating that this device does not rotate and will always remain in its default&#10;orientation. Activities that desire to run in a non-compatible orientation will be run&#10;from an emulated display within the physical display.

config_forceVoiceInteractionServicePacka.title: The config_forceVoiceInteractionServicePackage Schema
config_forceVoiceInteractionServicePacka.description: This config is used to force VoiceInteractionService to start on certain low ram devices.&#10;It declares the package name of VoiceInteractionService that should be started.

config_forceWindowDrawsStatusBarBackgrou.title: The config_forceWindowDrawsStatusBarBackground Schema
config_forceWindowDrawsStatusBarBackgrou.description: If set, this will force all windows to draw the status bar background, including the apps&#10;that have not requested doing so (via the WindowManager.FLAG_DRAWS_SYSTEM_BAR_BACKGROUNDS&#10;flag).

config_freeformWindowManagement.title: The config_freeformWindowManagement Schema
config_freeformWindowManagement.description: The device supports freeform window management. Windows have title bars and can be moved&#10;and resized. If you set this to true, you also need to add&#10;PackageManager.FEATURE_FREEFORM_WINDOW_MANAGEMENT feature to your device specification.&#10;The duplication is necessary, because this information is used before the features are&#10;available to the system.

config_fusedLocationProviderPackageName.title: The config_fusedLocationProviderPackageName Schema
config_fusedLocationProviderPackageName.description: Package name providing fused location support. Used only when&#10;config_enableFusedLocationOverlay is false.

config_geocoderProviderPackageName.title: The config_geocoderProviderPackageName Schema
config_geocoderProviderPackageName.description: Package name providing geocoder API support. Used only when&#10;config_enableGeocoderOverlay is false.

config_geofenceProviderPackageName.title: The config_geofenceProviderPackageName Schema
config_geofenceProviderPackageName.description: Package name providing geofence API support. Used only when&#10;config_enableGeofenceOverlay is false.

config_globalActionsKeyTimeout.title: The config_globalActionsKeyTimeout Schema
config_globalActionsKeyTimeout.description: Amount of time in ms the user needs to press the relevant key to bring up the global actions dialog

config_globalActionsList.title: The config_globalActionsList Schema
config_globalActionsList.description: Defines the default set of global actions. Actions may still be disabled or hidden based&#10;on the current state of the device.&#10;Each item must be one of the following strings:&#10;&quot;power&quot; = Power off&#10;&quot;settings&quot; = An action to launch settings&#10;&quot;airplane&quot; = Airplane mode toggle&#10;&quot;bugreport&quot; = Take bug report, if available&#10;&quot;silent&quot; = silent mode&#10;&quot;users&quot; = list of users&#10;&quot;restart&quot; = restart device&#10;

config_goToSleepOnButtonPressTheaterMode.title: The config_goToSleepOnButtonPressTheaterMode Schema
config_goToSleepOnButtonPressTheaterMode.description: If this is true, go to sleep when theater mode is enabled from button press

config_guestUserEphemeral.title: The config_guestUserEphemeral Schema
config_guestUserEphemeral.description: If true, all guest users created on the device will be ephemeral.

config_hardwareFlpPackageName.title: The config_hardwareFlpPackageName Schema
config_hardwareFlpPackageName.description: Package name providing Hardware Flp. Used only when&#10;config_enableHardwareFlpOverlay is false.

config_hasPermanentDpad.title: The config_hasPermanentDpad Schema
config_hasPermanentDpad.description: Override the DPad detection behavior for configuration purposes

config_hotswapCapable.title: The config_hotswapCapable Schema
config_hotswapCapable.description: Is the device capable of hot swapping an UICC Card

config_iccHotswapPromptForRestartDialogC.title: The config_iccHotswapPromptForRestartDialogComponent Schema
config_iccHotswapPromptForRestartDialogC.description: Component name of the ICC hotswap prompt for restart dialog

config_immersive_mode_confirmation_panic.title: The config_immersive_mode_confirmation_panic Schema
config_immersive_mode_confirmation_panic.description: Threshold (in ms) under which a screen off / screen on will be considered a reset of the&#10;immersive mode confirmation prompt.

config_intrusiveNotificationLed.title: The config_intrusiveNotificationLed Schema
config_intrusiveNotificationLed.description: Is the notification LED intrusive? Used to decide if there should be a disable option

config_isoImagePath.title: The config_isoImagePath Schema
config_isoImagePath.description: Path to an ISO image to be shared with via USB mass storage.&#10;This is intended to allow packaging drivers or tools for installation on a PC.

config_jobSchedulerIdleWindowSlop.title: The config_jobSchedulerIdleWindowSlop Schema
config_jobSchedulerIdleWindowSlop.description: The alarm window (in milliseconds) that JobScheduler uses to enter the idle state

config_jobSchedulerInactivityIdleThresho.title: The config_jobSchedulerInactivityIdleThreshold Schema
config_jobSchedulerInactivityIdleThresho.description: Inactivity threshold (in milliseconds) used in JobScheduler. JobScheduler will consider&#10;the device to be &quot;idle&quot; after being inactive for this long.

config_keyboardTapVibePattern.title: The config_keyboardTapVibePattern Schema
config_keyboardTapVibePattern.description: Vibrator pattern for a very short but reliable vibration for soft keyboard tap

config_lidControlsScreenLock.title: The config_lidControlsScreenLock Schema
config_lidControlsScreenLock.description: Indicate whether closing the lid causes the lockscreen to appear.&#10;The default is false.

config_lidControlsSleep.title: The config_lidControlsSleep Schema
config_lidControlsSleep.description: Indicate whether closing the lid causes the device to go to sleep and opening&#10;it causes the device to wake up.&#10;The default is false.

config_lidKeyboardAccessibility.title: The config_lidKeyboardAccessibility Schema
config_lidKeyboardAccessibility.description: Indicate whether the lid state impacts the accessibility of&#10;the physical keyboard.  0 means it doesn't, 1 means it is accessible&#10;when the lid is open, 2 means it is accessible when the lid is&#10;closed.  The default is 0.

config_lidNavigationAccessibility.title: The config_lidNavigationAccessibility Schema
config_lidNavigationAccessibility.description: Indicate whether the lid state impacts the accessibility of&#10;the navigation buttons.  0 means it doesn't, 1 means it is accessible&#10;when the lid is open, 2 means it is accessible when the lid is&#10;closed.  The default is 0.

config_lidOpenRotation.title: The config_lidOpenRotation Schema
config_lidOpenRotation.description: The number of degrees to rotate the display when the keyboard is open.&#10;A value of -1 means no change in orientation by default.

config_lightSensorWarmupTime.title: The config_lightSensorWarmupTime Schema
config_lightSensorWarmupTime.description: Amount of time it takes for the light sensor to warm up in milliseconds.&#10;For this time after the screen turns on, the Power Manager&#10;will not debounce light sensor readings

config_localDisplaysMirrorContent.title: The config_localDisplaysMirrorContent Schema
config_localDisplaysMirrorContent.description: When true, local displays that do not contain any of their own content will automatically&#10;mirror the content of the default display.

config_locationProviderPackageNames.title: The config_locationProviderPackageNames Schema
config_locationProviderPackageNames.description: Package name(s) containing location provider support.&#10;These packages can contain services implementing location providers,&#10;such as the Geocode Provider, Network Location Provider, and&#10;Fused Location Provider. They will each be searched for&#10;service components implementing these providers.&#10;It is strongly recommended that the packages explicitly named&#10;below are on the system image, so that they will not map to&#10;a 3rd party application.&#10;The location framework also has support for installation&#10;of new location providers at run-time. The new package does not&#10;have to be explicitly listed here, however it must have a signature&#10;that matches the signature of at least one package on this list.&#10;

config_lockDayNightMode.title: The config_lockDayNightMode Schema
config_lockDayNightMode.description: Control whether to lock day/night mode change from normal application. When it is&#10; true, day / night mode change is only allowed to apps with MODIFY_DAY_NIGHT_MODE&#10; permission.

config_lockSoundVolumeDb.title: The config_lockSoundVolumeDb Schema
config_lockSoundVolumeDb.description: The attenuation in dB applied to the lock/unlock sounds.

config_lockUiMode.title: The config_lockUiMode Schema
config_lockUiMode.description: Control whether to lock UI mode to what is selected from config_defaultUiModeType.&#10; Once UI mode is locked, applications cannot change it anymore.

config_longAnimTime.title: The config_longAnimTime Schema
config_longAnimTime.description: The duration (in milliseconds) of a long animation.

config_longPressOnBackBehavior.title: The config_longPressOnBackBehavior Schema
config_longPressOnBackBehavior.description: Control the behavior when the user long presses the back button.  Non-zero values are only&#10;valid for watches as part of CDD/CTS.&#10;   0 - Nothing&#10;   1 - Go to voice assist&#10;

config_longPressOnHomeBehavior.title: The config_longPressOnHomeBehavior Schema
config_longPressOnHomeBehavior.description: Control the behavior when the user long presses the home button.&#10;   0 - Nothing&#10;   1 - Recent apps view in SystemUI&#10;   2 - Launch assist intent&#10;This needs to match the constants in&#10;policy/src/com/android/internal/policy/impl/PhoneWindowManager.java&#10;

config_longPressOnPowerBehavior.title: The config_longPressOnPowerBehavior Schema
config_longPressOnPowerBehavior.description: Control the behavior when the user long presses the power button.&#10;   0 - Nothing&#10;   1 - Global actions menu&#10;   2 - Power off (with confirmation)&#10;   3 - Power off (without confirmation)&#10;

config_longPressVibePattern.title: The config_longPressVibePattern Schema
config_longPressVibePattern.description: Vibrator pattern for feedback about a long screen/key press

config_lowBatteryCloseWarningBump.title: The config_lowBatteryCloseWarningBump Schema
config_lowBatteryCloseWarningBump.description: Close low battery warning when battery level reaches the lowBatteryWarningLevel&#10;plus this

config_lowBatteryWarningLevel.title: The config_lowBatteryWarningLevel Schema
config_lowBatteryWarningLevel.description: Display low battery warning when battery level dips to this value

config_lowMemoryKillerMinFreeKbytesAbsol.title: The config_lowMemoryKillerMinFreeKbytesAbsolute Schema
config_lowMemoryKillerMinFreeKbytesAbsol.description: Device configuration setting the minfree tunable in the lowmemorykiller in the kernel.&#10;A high value will cause the lowmemorykiller to fire earlier, keeping more memory&#10;in the file cache and preventing I/O thrashing, but allowing fewer processes to&#10;stay in memory.  A low value will keep more processes in memory but may cause&#10;thrashing if set too low.  Overrides the default value chosen by ActivityManager&#10;based on screen size and total memory for the largest lowmemorykiller bucket, and&#10;scaled proportionally to the smaller buckets.  -1 keeps the default.

config_lowMemoryKillerMinFreeKbytesAdjus.title: The config_lowMemoryKillerMinFreeKbytesAdjust Schema
config_lowMemoryKillerMinFreeKbytesAdjus.description: Device configuration adjusting the minfree tunable in the lowmemorykiller in the&#10;kernel.  A high value will cause the lowmemorykiller to fire earlier, keeping more&#10;memory in the file cache and preventing I/O thrashing, but allowing fewer processes&#10;to stay in memory.  A low value will keep more processes in memory but may cause&#10;thrashing if set too low.  Directly added to the default value chosen by&#10;ActivityManager based on screen size and total memory for the largest lowmemorykiller&#10;bucket, and scaled proportionally to the smaller buckets. 0 keeps the default.

config_LTE_eri_for_network_name.title: The config_LTE_eri_for_network_name Schema
config_LTE_eri_for_network_name.description: Use ERI text for network name on CDMA LTE

config_LTE_RSRP_threshold_type.title: The config_LTE_RSRP_threshold_type Schema
config_LTE_RSRP_threshold_type.description: Flag indicating whether strict threshold is used, or lenient threshold is used,&#10; when evaluating RSRP for LTE antenna bar display&#10;  0. Strict threshold&#10;  1. Lenient threshold&#10;

config_mainBuiltInDisplayIsRound.title: The config_mainBuiltInDisplayIsRound Schema
config_mainBuiltInDisplayIsRound.description: Whether the main built-in display is round. This will affect&#10;Configuration.screenLayout's SCREENLAYOUT_ROUND_MASK flags for Configurations on the&#10;main built-in display. Change this in device-specific overlays.&#10;Defaults to the older, deprecated config_windowIsRound already used in&#10;some existing device-specific resource overlays.

config_max_initial_scans_on_selective_ch.title: The config_max_initial_scans_on_selective_channels Schema
config_max_initial_scans_on_selective_ch.description: Integer indicating the number of selective channel scan when Wifi turn on

config_max_pan_devices.title: The config_max_pan_devices Schema
config_max_pan_devices.description: Max number of Bluetooth tethering connections allowed. If this is&#10;updated config_tether_dhcp_range has to be updated appropriately.

config_MaxConcurrentDownloadsAllowed.title: The config_MaxConcurrentDownloadsAllowed Schema
config_MaxConcurrentDownloadsAllowed.description: Max number of downloads allowed to proceed concurrently

config_maximumScreenDimDuration.title: The config_maximumScreenDimDuration Schema
config_maximumScreenDimDuration.description: User activity timeout: Maximum screen dim duration in milliseconds.&#10;&#10;Sets an upper bound for how long the screen will dim before the device goes&#10;to sleep when there is no user activity.  The dim duration is subtracted from&#10;the overall screen off timeout to determine the screen dim timeout.&#10;When the screen dim timeout expires, the screen will dim, shortly thereafter&#10;the device will go to sleep.&#10;&#10;If the screen off timeout is very short, the dim duration may be reduced&#10;proportionally.  See config_maximumScreenDimRatio.&#10;&#10;This value may be zero in which case the screen will not dim before the&#10;device goes to sleep.&#10;

config_maximumScreenDimRatio.title: The config_maximumScreenDimRatio Schema
config_maximumScreenDimRatio.description: User activity timeout: Maximum screen dim duration as a percentage of screen off timeout.&#10;&#10;This resource is similar to config_maximumScreenDimDuration but the maximum&#10;screen dim duration is defined as a ratio of the overall screen off timeout&#10;instead of as an absolute value in milliseconds.  This is useful for reducing&#10;the dim duration when the screen off timeout is very short.&#10;&#10;When computing the screen dim duration, the power manager uses the lesser&#10;of the effective durations expressed by config_maximumScreenDimDuration and&#10;config_maximumScreenDimRatio.&#10;&#10;This value must be between 0% and 100%.  If the value is zero, the screen will not&#10;dim before the device goes to sleep.&#10;

config_maxResolverActivityColumns.title: The config_maxResolverActivityColumns Schema
config_maxResolverActivityColumns.description: Maximum number of grid columns permitted in the ResolverActivity&#10;used for picking activities to handle an intent.

config_mdc_initial_max_retry.title: The config_mdc_initial_max_retry Schema
config_mdc_initial_max_retry.description: Set initial MaxRetry value for operators

config_mediumAnimTime.title: The config_mediumAnimTime Schema
config_mediumAnimTime.description: The duration (in milliseconds) of a medium-length animation.

config_minimumScreenOffTimeout.title: The config_minimumScreenOffTimeout Schema
config_minimumScreenOffTimeout.description: User activity timeout: Minimum screen off timeout in milliseconds.&#10;&#10;Sets a lower bound for the {@link Settings.System#SCREEN_OFF_TIMEOUT} setting&#10;which determines how soon the device will go to sleep when there is no&#10;user activity.&#10;&#10;This value must be greater than zero, otherwise the device will immediately&#10;fall asleep again as soon as it is awoken.&#10;

config_mms_content_disposition_support.title: The config_mms_content_disposition_support Schema
config_mms_content_disposition_support.description: If this value is true, The mms content-disposition field is supported correctly.&#10;If false, Content-disposition fragments are ignored

config_mobile_hotspot_provision_app.title: The config_mobile_hotspot_provision_app Schema
config_mobile_hotspot_provision_app.description: The first element is the package name and the second element is the class name&#10;of the provisioning app

config_mobile_hotspot_provision_app_no_u.title: The config_mobile_hotspot_provision_app_no_ui Schema
